section.name: The Helianto Project goals
section.p: Helianto project is about productivity in Java development.

subsection.name: Creating New Projects Based on Helianto

ol.li: include Helianto dependencies in a new Maven project pom,
extend (or create) domain, dao or service beans to implement the desired functionality,
update dependency injection context definition required by the new dao or service beans,
write the presentation layer using a MVC framework of choice, as Struts, JSF, Spring or Spring Web Flow,
if using Spring Web Flow, add provided credential and access flows as plugins,
deploy the application to a servlet container.

subsection.p: Although Helianto imposes no restriction to the presentation layer, use of Freemarker is encouraged.
